title: Geraldo Gets Called Out (Ep 1668)
description:
Your email isn’t safe anymore. I warned you about this dangerous new attack on privacy, and now it’s happening. Also, I address my blow up with Geraldo last night. 

News Picks:

Inflation is exploding as wholesale prices reach historic highs.


Tyranny is here. Mark Meadows is held in contempt for exercising his constitutional rights.

Judge holds hospital in contempt of court for refusing ivermectin.

The Bubba Wallace hoax is back.


Rumble cancels the cancellers!
